titleStmt.title: The benefit of the auncient bathes of Buckstones vvhich cureth most greeuous sicknesses, neuer before published: / compiled by Iohn Iones phisition. At the Kings Mede nigh Darby. Anno salutis 1572. Seene and alowed acording to the order appointed.
titleStmt.author: Jones, John, physician.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ienuarii. xviii. Imprinted at London by Tho. East, and Henry Myddleton: for William Iones. And are to be sold at his long shop at the west dore of Paules. Church,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part 3 of the issue of "A briefe, excellent, and profitable discourse, of the naturall beginning of all growing and living things, heate, generation, effects of the spirits, government, use and abuse of phisicke, preservation, &c." (the expanded reissue, STC 14725).
Identified as the second part of STC 14725 at reel 420:16.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 420 and at reel 1855 (same copy filmed twice).

place.placeName: his long shop at the west dore of Paules. Church
